commands.cooldown: Sorry **{{username}}**, but you need to wait {{time}} second(s) before you can use this command again!
commands.argument_not_specified: Sorry **{{username}}**, argument `{{argument}}` is required but you didn't specify it
commands.nsfw_not_enabled:
Sorry **{{username}}**, NSFW is not enabled in this channel!
Ask someone who can edit this channel to enable it here. (https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000084051)
commands.flag_requires_arg: Sorry **{{username}}**, flag `{{flag}}` requires an argument but you didn't specify one!
commands.loli_is_illegal:
Sorry **{{username}}**, but Discord doesn't allow loli or shotacon.
<https://discordapp.com/guidelines>
https://cat.girlsare.life/c3702f.png
commands.user_has_contract: **{{username}}** you already are a magical girl!
commands.ask_sure_mg: Are you sure you want to become a magical girl? [y/N]
commands.mg_cancelled: **{{username}}** come back if you've changed your mind
commands.permium_command:
Sorry **{{username}}**, but this command is a premium-only command!
(for more info on premium features, use {{prefix}}premium)

permissions.user_lack_perms: Sorry **{{username}}**, you don't have the {{permission}} permission.
permissions.bot_lack_perms: Sorry **{{username}}**, I don't have the {{permission}} permission.

error.error:
Oh no! An error occured! 
```diff
- {{error}}
```
If you feel like this shouldn't have happened, please report it!

translations.invalid_language: **{{language}}** is not a valid language, for a list of languages use `{{prefix}}locale list`

settings.prefix_remove_fail: 🚫 This server hasn't got a custom prefix yet!
settings.log_channel_set_fail: 🚫 You can't set the default channel as log channel!
settings.prefix_default: Server hasn't got a custom prefix!

music.join_voice_channel_fail: **{{username}}** you aren't in a voice channel!
music.video_search_fail: Sorry **{{user}}**, I couldn't find any videos matching `{{search}}`
music.voteskip_add_success: Added your vote to skip. `{{votes}}` votes, `{{total_votes}}` needed
music.source_not_supported: Sorry **{{username}}**, I don't support playing music from that site (yet?)!
music.playlist_non_premium: Sorry **{{username}}**, but adding a playlist with more than 20 songs is a premium feature! I'll be adding the first 20 songs instead of whole playlist/album. (for more info on premium features, use `{{prefix}}premium`)
music.song_is_stream: HTTP Stream detected, don't need to download this.
music.twitch_no_audio_format: Couldn't find Audio Only format for this stream!
music.already_downloading: **{{username}}** please wait until the other download has finished!
music.sources: Sources which I can play from:
music.request_source: If there's a source you would like to have the bot play from, but it isn't in the list, you can always make a suggestion for it in my support server!
music.too_loud: Woah! Don't you think thats a bit too loud?
music.not_in_channel: You aren't in a voice channel!
music.cant_force_skip_lol: **{{username}}**, you can't force-skip the current song!

search.user_not_found: Sorry **{{username}}**, I couldn't find that user!
search.guild_not_found: Sorry **{{username}}**, I couldn't find that guild!
search.anime_not_found: Sorry **{{username}}**, I couldn't find anime matching your query!
search.manga_not_found: Sorry **{{username}}**, I couldn't find manga matching your query!
search.choose_user: **{{username}}**, please choose a user from the list below. (times out in 30 seconds)
search.choose_channel: **{{username}}**, please choose a channel from the list below. (times out in 30 seconds)
search.choose_item: **{{username}}**, please choose an item from the list below. (times out in 30 seconds)
search.no_images_found: Sorry **{{username}}**, but I couldn't find any images matching your query!
